questions.questionTitle: Who is the intended audience for this advertisement?
How much money must customers pay in advance to buy a vehicle?
What does the speaker urge listeners to do?

script: Hi friends. Sherry Hawkins here, owner of Hawkins Motors. Do you need a new car but feel like you can't afford one? Well come on down to Hawkins, where you can buy a new or used vehicle for just $30 down. You heard right: Not $3,000, not $300, just $30 down lets you drive off the lot in your very own vehicle. We have hundreds of new and used compacts, sedans, SUVs or pick-ups to choose from, and a variety of financing options to meet your needs even if your credit's not too hot. Still think you can't afford a car? Think again friends. Come on down to Hawkins Motors, at the intersection of Highway 5 and State Route 99. We're open 9-5 weekdays, 9-9 on Saturdays and Sundays. We'll see you soon!
